characters.story: "JYOH!" he commands sharply - mother's brother, maternal uncle!
"JWAHNG!" the tree sings cheerfully - a stake, post, and pile!
"DZAO?" the side by side, needle, mortar, missile, and metal question curiously - to bore a hole, drill, and chisel?
The rodent bends down drooping - a mouse, rat, and rodent.
"TSWAN!" the hole commands sharply - to scurry, flee, and push the chest!
"LAH!" the flesh, mouse, and hairs command sharply - dried meat, cured and preserved!
"LAH!" the insect commands sharply - wax, beeswax, and candle!
"LYEH!" the dog commands sharply - to hunt, chase game!
"SOH!" the boat sings cheerfully - vessels, ships to measure!
The woman bends down drooping - elder brother's wife, sister-in-law!
"SHOH!" it commands sharply - emaciated, thin, and skinny!
"SOH!" the detective's fingers sing cheerfully while searching through the drawers for clues!
"DAO!" the farmer commands sharply, scooping up wild unhulled rice from the paddy!
The wooden leg bends down drooping as he treads carefully across the muddy path.
"TAO!" the surging water sings cheerfully, rushing like a scoop pouring endlessly!
"SHYEN!" she commands sharply when her car got stuck in the pinnacle's mud trap!
"YEN!" the flame commands sharply, leaping high from the campfire!
"SHYEN!" the chef commands sharply, spooning dumpling filling into the pothole-shaped dough!
"LYAHNG!" he commands sharply, counting the vehicles lined up on the road!
"MAN?" her twenty eyeballs question curiously - is she trying to dissemble and hide the truth from the yoke?
The St. Bernard dog bends down drooping after stitching - he's frank about his exhaustion.
"JWAY!" the seamstress commands sharply, using threads to embellish the stitching on the dress!
"PUNG!" the stone commands sharply when they bump into the wall!
"NWOH?" the fingers question curiously - should we transfer the prisoner from Alcatraz?
"WOO!" the lawyer's words sing cheerfully though he'd charge falsely to win the case!
"YOO!" they command sharply when offering words of praise for his reputation!
The mountain bends down drooping to form a small islet in the bay.
The person bends down drooping over the farmer's almanac with animal legs - he's too thick-headed to understand!
"JWAN!" the mason sings cheerfully, laying each brick in the stone wall!
"HWAY!" my heart commands sharply - will you do me a favor?
"SWAY!" the wild rice commands sharply, each ear of grain swaying in the favor of wind!
"KWAHNG!" the sun commands sharply over the expansive internet of wilderness!
"KWAHNG!" the stone commands sharply when they discover the mine shaft!
"KWOH!" the fingers command sharply on the screen to enlarge the photo!
"TSUNG!" the ear sings cheerfully - listen and you'll be smart!
"TSUNG!" the flower sings cheerfully, following the GPS in my heart to find onions!
The flesh bends down drooping during surgery to remove the gall bladder.
"JAN!" the eyeballs sing cheerfully to the snitch - look upward at the stars!
The fingers bend down drooping like the flying Dutchman to cuddle the baby.
The flag bends down drooping like the flying Dutchman - time and again the villagers are harmed.
"JWOH?" the water questions curiously through the butterfly net - is it turbid or clear?
"JOO?" the fire questions curiously - is this a candle or a torch?
"CHOO!" she commands sharply - don't touch the hot stove!
The mouth bends down drooping as father admonished me before leaving.
"LAN?" the tree questions curiously - will it become a railing for the deck?
"LAN?" the fingers question curiously like a gargoyle - why do you impede my path?
"DZUNG!" the lower leg sings cheerfully, following the tracks through the woods!
The ear bends down drooping as I follow his shrug - he doesn't know either.
"JEE!" the doctor commands sharply, prescribing a pharmaceutical remedy!
"JAI!" the mirror image sings cheerfully though small - we abstain from food during the fast!
The fingers bend down drooping in the mirror image trying to squeeze into the crowded subway.
The metal push button bends down drooping when pressed.
"SHYOH!" the sheep sings cheerfully despite being shy at the petting zoo!
The thread bends down drooping in New York's garment district.
"PEE?" the lowly flesh questions curiously - is that the spleen or another organ?
"PEE?" the mouth questions curiously - is there beer at the party?
"BAY!" the lowly stone sings cheerfully - an ancient stele monument!
"HUH!" he commands sharply with illustrious authority!
"SHYAH!" the mouth commands sharply with illustrious words to terrify the children!
"YEE!" the apple and St. Bernard command sharply, radiating vitality and energy!
"JEE!" the wooden leg commands sharply - an indication of where he walked!
"TSIH?" he questions curiously about the phraseology in the contract.
"GWAY!" the tortoise sings cheerfully, slowly crossing the road!
"SHUNG?" the thread questions curiously - is this rope strong enough to climb?
"YING?" the insect questions curiously like a tortoise - are those flies buzzing around?
"HOO?" the insect questions curiously - the front part of the butterfly character.
"DYEH?" the insect questions curiously - the back part of the butterfly character.
